topic.title: Example 7 Staff retraining as a result of changes in the income tax system

body.p: The government introduces a number of changes to the income tax system. As a result of these changes, an entity in the financial services sector will need to retrain a large proportion of its administrative and sales workforce in order to ensure continued compliance with financial services regulation. At the end of the reporting period, no retraining of staff has taken place.
Present obligation as a result of a past obligating event – There is no obligation because no obligating event (retraining) has taken place.
Conclusion – No provision is recognised (see paragraphs 14 and 17–19).
